fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Barriers include legal requirements such as requirements for membership or financial deposits, as well as harassment.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_ordering: If your answer is 1-4, proceed to the next question [v2psoppaut]. If your answer is 0, skip to the question about Party organization [v2psorgs].
fxInfo_question: How restrictive are the barriers to forming a party?

fxInfo_responses.value: It is impossible, or virtually impossible, for parties not affiliated with the government to form (legally).
There are significant obstacles (e.g. party leaders face high levels of regular political harassment by authorities).
There are modest barriers (e.g. party leaders face occasional political harassment by authorities).

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2psbars, *_osp, *_ord
